tweet.text: RT @NASAhistory: "School children in Bavaria and students in Mexico were excused from classes that day. Many world capitals were deserted a…
tweet.html: RT @NASAhistory: "School children in Bavaria and students in Mexico were excused from classes that day. Many world capitals were deserted at the time of the launch or during other daytime events, as people stayed near their television sets." #ArchivesInSpace #NASA60th twitter.com/HistoryAtState…
